item.description:
Spend the day at WorkBar Boston for


  • Everyone: Free Coworking all day
  • Startups: Office hours with VC Jon O'Shaughnessy of Dace Ventures
  • Service Providers: Join the WorkBar community on BrightMap and find clients
  • Everyone: Office hours with With New Leaf Legal
  • Everyone: Happy Hour!


Click here to sign up!



1) Everyone: Coworking at WorkBar Includes

WiFi Internet * Unlimited conference calling * Unlimited fax * Color and B&W; printing * Free coffee & snacks * Conference/meeting rooms * 24 Hour building access * Projector and screens for presentations * Lounge and private phone areas * Spacious workspaces * Kitchen



2) Startups: Office hours with Jon O'Shaughnessy from Dace Ventures

2:30PM - 4:30PM

Pitch your business and investment ideas to one of Boston's top Venture Capitalists. Jon O'Shaughnessy from Dace Ventures will be holding office hours for startups.

Click here to reserve your 15-minute slot with Jon



3) Service Providers: Join the WorkBar community on BrightMap and find clients

WorkBar is partnering with BrightMap, a marketplace for professional services (lawyers, accountants, designers, developers, consultants), to promote your business inside and outside of the WorkBar community.

If you are a professional service provider you can list your firm on BrightMap now or when you arrive at WorkBar for Coworking on July 13. Your company will be featured in WorkBar's online directory of service providers and you'll be given a name card to (optionally) display at your desk to let other WorkBar members know you're available to discuss new business opportunities.



4) Everyone: Office hours with New Leaf Legal

2:00PM - 4:00PM

Contemplating a new and exciting deal? Not quite sure how to structure your relationship with your software coder? Concerned about how to properly leverage your invention or brand name? Swing by and talk it out with New Leafâ€™s band of emerging business attorneys, Jessica, Shannon & Steven. More

Reserve your 15-minute slot here for July 13th (Please note date of timeslot)



5) Everyone: 5:00 HAPPY HOUR with


  • Graham Lawlor, Founder of Ultra Light Startups and CEO of BrightMap
  • Jon O'Shaughnessy from Dace Ventures
  • The WorkBar Team and Our Members!
item.name: Free Coworking, Office Hours and Happy Hour
